item.description:
Let's enjoy the foliage by horse back. Bobby's Ranch in Action, MA offers many acres of trails to enjoy, guided by well qualified personnel. Enjoy the New England scenery, old rock walls, streams and forest.

The horses are Western style like the cowboys, are quiet and well trained, for the beginner to better riders. We try to accommodate all levels of riders by splitting each ride. Those that know how to ride and those that don’t. Safety is our top priority. There will be no galloping or racing.

The weekends rate is $35.00 per hour. We will start the ride at 11:00

A credit card is required to hold your spot - Call 978-263-7165 or email equine@ultranet.com

Please do not rely on your navigational device or Google. We strongly advise asking for directions when you call to reserve a spot.

Directions:
From Rte 495 go East on Rte 119 to NAGOG PARK.
Take a left into the mall, left again.
Left again and follow the Bobby’s Ranch signs

I will be leaving from the Welcome Center, off Exit 6 in Nashua. Please indicate you're interested in carpooling from this location in your RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meet up pin
item.name: Horse Back Riding at Bobby's Ranch
